## **Week 1**
### Monday: Compound Lower Body

\begin{itemize}
  \item \emph{Warmup}: TRX Squat 2 x 10
  \item \emph{Explosive Movement}: Box Jump 3 x 5 
\end{itemize}
\begin{enumerate}
  \item Font Squat 5 x 5
  \item TB Deadlist 3 x 10
  \item Superset x 3
  \begin{enumerate}
    \item Goblet Squat x 12
    \item DB RDLs x 12 - 15
  \end{enumerate}
\end{enumerate}

* \emph{Cooldown}: Mobility work / Roll Legs / Stretch

### Tuesday: Compound Upper Body

\begin{itemize}
  \item \emph{Warmup}: Superset x 3
  \begin{enumerate}
    \item Plyo-pushups x 5
    \item Face Pulls x 10
  \end{enumerate}
  \item \emph{Explosive} Movement: Push Press 3 x 5
\end{itemize}
\begin{enumerate}
  \item Pullups (weighted) 4 x 5
  \item DB Bench 4 x 5
  \item DB Row 3 x 10
  \item Triset x 3
  \begin{enumerate}
    \item Standing Arnold Press x 8-10
    \item DB Hammer Curls x 6 - 10
    \item DB close-grip Pushups x 15 - 20
  \end{enumerate}
  \item Superset x 3
  \begin{enumerate}
    \item Inclince DB Bench x 12 - 15
    \item Incline Lever Rows x 12 - 15
  \end{enumerate}
\end{enumerate}

* \emph{Cooldown}: stretch/hang

### Wednesday: Sprint/Core
\begin{enumerate}
  \item SPRINT 8
  \item Landmine 180s 4 x 10 - 12
  \item Superset x 3
  \begin{enumerate}
    \item Standing Rollouts x 5 - 10
    \item Decline (weighted) Situps x 10 - 12
  \end{enumerate}
  \item Superset x 3
  \begin{enumerate}
    \item Hanging Leg Raises x 8 - 10
    \item Cable Crunch x 12 - 15
  \end{enumerate}
  \item \emph{Finisher}: Sled Push or Farmers Walks (Timed, Distance, EMOM, or Tabata)
\end{enumerate}

* \emph{Cooldown}: stretch

\end{enumerate}

* \emph{Cooldown}: Mobility work / Roll Legs / Stretch

#### Friday: Uni-Lateral Upper Body

  \begin{enumerate}
    \item Plyo-pushups x 5
    \item Face Pulls x 10
  \end{enumerate}
\end{itemize}
  
\begin{enumerate}

### Saturday: Multifunctional

  \item Chinup + Pushup Desceding Superset Pyramid
  \item Sprint Tabata
